github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Only generate commit messages in Conventional Commits format: <type>(<scope>): <description>. Allowed types: feat, fix, docs, style, refactor, perf, test, chore, ci.
Include an optional blank line followed by a body that explains why the change was made and any relevant context.
If needed, include footers like BREAKING CHANGE: and references to issues or tasks.
Examples: feat(ui): add dark mode toggle, fix(auth): resolve token refresh bug, docs: update contribution guidelines.
